definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across

sentences.english: Cumin lamb kebabs, oily but fun.
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉串，油油的但挺有趣。

sentences.english: Young boys in plastic sandals called out in high, hoarse voices, selling skewers of goat meat.
sentences.chinese: 穿着塑料拖鞋的男孩们用粗哑的声音高声叫卖羊肉串。

sentences.english: The prisoners' favorites included meat Kebab and pizza, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 据称囚犯们最喜欢的外卖是羊肉串和比萨饼。

sentences.english: The acrid smell of lamb kebabs and the sweet smell of cakes soaked in honey reign over everything else.
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉串的辛香和蜜制蛋糕的甜香扑面而来。

sentences.english: But a shish kebab is one of the healthiest choices on the fast-food circuit.
sentences.chinese: 但一串羊肉串是快餐食品中最健康的选择之一。

sentences.english: Stick with a straightforward chicken shish kebab and you cannot go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 坚持一个简单的鸡肉烤羊肉串，你不能出错。

sentences.english: I heard you really like mutton skewers and that you can eat 50 at one time.
sentences.chinese: 听说你特别爱吃羊肉串儿，一次能吃五十串儿。

sentences.english: Famished, I went to try the Persian shish kebab with pomegranate sauce.
sentences.chinese: 极其饥饿的我想尝试石榴汁波斯羊肉串。

sentences.english: Authentic Xinjiang mutton keBabs (kaboBs) win universal praise and their fragrance spreads all around.
sentences.chinese: 正宗新疆羊肉串，脍炙人口，香溢四方。

sentences.english: Do you wanna go eat lamb kebabs with me?
sentences.chinese: 要不要和我一起去吃羊肉串？

sentences.english: The acrid smell of lamb kebabs and the sweet smell of cakes soggy in honey predominate over everything else.
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉串的辛香和蜜制蛋糕的甜香扑面而来。

sentences.english: I saw lots of grapes and ate lots of mutton kebabs.
sentences.chinese: 我看到许多葡萄，吃了许多烤羊肉串。

sentences.english: He sells the most authentic lamb kebabs .
sentences.chinese: 他卖的羊肉串是最正宗的。

sentences.english: Mutton string stand someone is holding a mutton string big eat.
sentences.chinese: 羊肉串摊前有的人正在举着羊肉串大吃。

sentences.english: Mutton string stand someone is holding a mutton string big eat.
sentences.chinese: 羊肉串摊前有的人正在举着羊肉串大吃。

definition: lit. meat wedged in steamed bun/"Chinese burger"/sliced meat sandwich popular in north China
hand-held mutton (mutton pieces on the bone, eaten with the fingers)
pilaf (rice dish popular in many parts of the world, including Xinjiang)/pilau
